name: Lara Tunic. Handpainted Bamboo Rayon/Spandex pique knit.
description:
This Tunic is the perfect casually elegant Top to go with just about any bottom part.
Multiple circles dance up one side, over the sleeves and down the back.

name: Kira Tunic. Shibori. Bamboo Rayon/Spandex pique knit.
description:
This is a happy tunic to wear with leggings, over Jeans, with a skirt.
Ivory sustainable bamboo rayon has just enough spandex (5%) to keep its shape beautifully.

options.name: L/XL ivory w. teal and chartreuse
S/M  ivory w. teal and chartreuse
Plus  ivory w. teal and chartreuse

name: Asymmetrical Top in Rayon/Spandex knit. Hand painted.
description:
Soft, drapey rayon/spandex knit with the Delight design.
Wear anywhere, any time.

name: Alison Tunic - handpainted rayon/spandex
description:
Beautiful, fun, easy wear tunic in super soft rayon/spandex knit.
Lightweight. Wear it casually elegant with jeans for your coffee out or dress it up for an evening out.
Geo Design is simply stunning.

name: Lara Tunic - hand painted rayon/spandex
description:
Lightweight, super soft rayon/spandex knit is hand painted with the Delight Design. Terracotta/salsa color brings life to your day.
Fabulous with jeans and simply elegant with black pants or a skirt.

name: Lara Tunic - Rayon/Spandex - Hand Painted
description: This is a top for any casually elegant occasion. It can be dressed up or dressed down. Or create a Lagenlook with it.

name: Leela Tunic - antique gold Rayon/Acetate Crepe
description:
This Design makes you feel alive and energetic. Yet, the antique gold color gives it a nice sophistication. 
The Leela Style is very flattering on many body types.
Wear it with the removable collar for a beautiful drape around your neck. Or leave the collar off for a simple boat neckline. 

Both, rayon and acetate, are made from wood pulp. 
The fabric is dense and has some "body". I wear it in the Texas heat and it feels comfortable.

To view more photos, scroll down.

options.name: Antique Gold with black paint- size S/M
Antique Gold with black paint- size M/L
Antique Gold with black paint - size L/XL
Antique Gold with black paint- size Plus
Terracotta with black paint - size S/M
Terracotta with black paint - size M/L
Terracotta with black paint size L/XL
Terracotta with black paint - size Plus
Khaki with black paint - size S/M
Khaki with black paint - size M/L
Khaki with black paint - size L/XL     Kze L/XL
i with black paint - size Plus

name: Go Anywhere City Dress
description:
A go to dress for the spring and summer.
Or layer it in the winter months. A perfect Lagenlook dress that pairs well with long pants and a long sleeve top, or with a long dress underneath, or a long skirt and top. Drape a shawl around the neck, wear a vest over it.....almost endless options...

name: Leela Tunic with removable Collar. Hand painted.
description:
Deliciously soft fabric. 95%Bamboo Rayon/5% Spandex. Incredible drape! 
With  a strong and energetic hand painted Drumbeat Design.  
Great with Jeans. 
Casually elegant with a black skirt or black pants.

name: Shibori Lara Tunic
description:
Stunning, soft, luscious, beautiful.........
A top that puts the sunshine in the day.
Soft, golden yellow rayon/spandex knit  hand painted in teal using a Shibori technique.

name: Marigold Alison Tunic - Hand Painted Geo Design
description: Beautiful, soft rayon/spandex fabric with a magnificent drape.

name: Sand Lara Tunic - Bamboo Rayon/Spandex
description:
The ideal weight top to wear year round. Layered in the winter. On it's own otherwise.
Bamboo rayon/Spandex pique falls beautifully and is flattering for any body type.
Energetic Drumbeat Design.

name: Fuchsia Hand Painted Shawl
description: Another super luxe shawl that feels like cashmere. Soft Viscose in vibrant fuchsia with hand painted Energy Design.

name: Soft Yellow Shawl - Hand Painted
description:
Stunning shawl that makes you feel happy and uplifted. It brightens our day and lifts any mood.
Super soft Viscose that feels like cashmere.

name: Emerald Poncho Top - Hand Painted
description:
Super luscious, soft viscose Poncho Top. 
Emerald color - it doesn't show right here, though. 
Wear it with the seam to the back - as in photo 1.
Seam over one shoulder - as in photo 2.
Seam to the front for a poncho look. 
Or scrunch it up and wear as a shawl.
It's one of those pieces that is great to have in the car.

name: Hand Painted Ombre Poncho Top
description:
Striking, yet simple poncho top with the "Flow" design hand painted onto it.
Wear it with the seam to the side - as shown, with the seam to the back, with the seam to the front - and change the look to suit your moods.
Or keep fashionably warm when worn as a neck shawl. As shown in the second photo.

name: Spring Poncho Top
description:
One of those have-to-have-it pieces.
Cashmere soft Viscose in a delicious spring color.

name: Black/grey Ombre Shawl - Hand Painted Energy Design
description:
Luscious Shawl! Goes with almost anything. 
About 24" x 72".

name: Poncho Top - Hand Painted with Energy Design
description:
Cashmere feeling Viscose Poncho Top - super soft, fluid, easy wear.
Wear the seam to the front - as in the first photo, or to the side - as in the 2nd photo, or wear it to the front. Or fold it in half and loop ends thru the opening for a traditional shawl look.
The color is actually more emerald. Just couldn't get it right in the photo. So - it is more of a luscious emerald green.

name: Poncho Top - Hand Painted Delight Design
description: This feels like cashmere - it is soft, light weight and very versatile. Wear the seam to the side - as shown - wear it to the back, to the front, flit the corners over the shoulder. Fold it in half and loop thru the opening for the traditional shawl look.

name: Lapis Hand Painted Shawl
description:
Versatile, fun, beautiful.
Soft Viscose is hand painted with the "Energy" design.
Shawl is about 22" by 70".

name: Ruana - Reversible
description:
Beautiful colors! Reversible Ruana. 
The perfect Fall companion.
Keep it in your car. Take it out when you want to dazzle, be warm or just want to have more fun.
Wear it different ways:
as shown, flip one side over your shoulder, fold it up lengthwise and wear as a shawl wrap.

Scroll down for more photos.

name: Reversible Ruana
description:
Gorgeous Ruana that can be reversed to  a darker color. 
Wear it casual or elegant.
Reverse it to a darker color.
Wear several ways. 
Scroll down to view more photos.

name: Paisley Ruana - Reversible
description:
Luscious pattern. Beautiful colors.
A Ruana to live in.
Perfect for every day with jeans - or dressed up for a special occasion.

Scroll down to view more photos.

name: Alison - color block French Terry Tunic
description:
Stunning, cozy, fun fall sweater in a medium weight 100% cotton French Terry. Center ovals hand painted design.
Easy wear - easy care. Perfect go to tunic. Change the look by removing the separate collar and wear as a boat neck tunic.

name: Alison - color block French Terry Tunic - Didgery Design
description:
Another fun 100% cotton French Terry Tunic with the hand painted Didgery Design. Shown as a boat neck.
Can also be worn with a separate cowl neck.

name: Janine - French Terry color blocked Top
description:
This is really fun to wear. It looks amazing and makes you feel free, joyful and casually elegant.
100% cotton French Terry. Hand painted Mystique Design.

name: Janine Top - Didgery Hand Painted Design
description:
Casually elegant, fun easy to wear. Dress it up, dress it down.
Cozy into it and you'll feel happy, fresh and relaxed at the same time.
The cowl neck is removable - turns it into a boat neck top for warmer weather - or just a different look.
100% Cotton French Terry.

name: Joy Tunic - handpainted - grey rayon crinkle. Drumbeat design.
description:
Fabulously flattering and fun to wear.
Rayon crinkle fabric with an amazing drape.
Energetic Drumbeat Design. Hand painted with lots of abandon.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Dusty Rose Cotton Tunic - Hand Painted
description:
The Drumbeat Design - hand painted with lots of joy - is fun, energetic and alive.
A great combination with the more subdued dusty rose.
Don't you just love juxtapositions!

name: Rome Tunic Dress - Black and White Cotton
description:
The perfect Tunic Dress to pack for a get-away.
It is  casually elegant and can be dressed up or down.
Wear it over jeans, with leggings, capri pants, a skirt.
Belt it or wear it loose.

Medium weight 100% cotton.

Scroll down to view more photos.

name: Drama Vest - red tencel - hand painted
description:
This just feels like you can do anything and go anywhere.
Very energetic red tencel with the Drum Beat design hand painted onto it. Strong, vibrant, alive.
Wear it long (photos 1-3) - or upside down for a shorter, more of a shoulder-capelet/vest/jacket - as shown in photo #4..


To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Janine Top - Color Blocked Black and White
description:
This is a stunner. And super comfortable at the same time.
Has an amazing drape!
Looks equally fabulous with jeans or with dressy pants, skirts or the Flair Pants in some of the photos here.
Can be layered with long sleeved tops and turtle necks.

Black Tencel with off-white Cotton. The off-white is hand painted in the Didgery design. 

Scroll down to view more photos.

name: Rome Tunic - Dress  Black with royal and copper paint
description:
Fabulous Tunic - Dress!
One of those go-to items that are a must-have. 
Versatile, fun, flattering.
Shown with Jeans and with the Flair Pants in black tencel.
Those Pants have a great drape, look fabulous on most bodies - perfect "Flair" for any occasion. Casual or elegant.

Scroll down to view more photos.

options.name: O/S, Black with royal and copper paint - one size

name: JOY TUNIC with Drum Beat design,turquoise rayon crinkle
description:
It feels like you are not wearing anything. Soft, drapes incredibly and feels uplifting. 
Rayon crinkle fabric.

In the first photo it is shown with ITY Flair Pants.
Second photo is back view.
In the third photo the tunic is shown belted and worn with a matching Dance Skirt.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: BACCAL JACKET
description:
An amazing Jacket!
Looks great on anyone. Light weight rayon/acetate crepe in a terracotta color (sorry, the color doesn't show right). Fabulous with jeans, or dressed up.
It can even be worn as a top.
Drimbeat hand painted energetic Design.

To view more photos, scroll down.

options.name: O/S one size (up to 46" bust) - terracotta
O/S one size (up to 46" bust)- khaki
O/S one size(up to 46" bust) - antique gold
O/S one size (up to 46" bust)e - olive

name: Drama Vest, white tencel with black paint
description:
You just have to love the drama in this vest.
Fabulous tencel/rayon blend.
Hand painted with great abandon. Feel it when you wear it.
 
It takes Jeans and a top to new heights.
And is ready to go out anywhere with the  black ITY Flair pants and a black ITY Lynne top.

Wear it longer - as in photos 1 to 3 -  or turn it upside down and wear it like a shoulder cape vest/jacket - as shown in photos 4 and 5.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Thai Top in Linen/Rayon blend with Handpainted Applique
description:
Very flattering on many body types!
It's a top that looks equally stunning with a pair of jeans, dressed up with nice slacks or artsy, fun with the red handpainted Studio pants in the photo.
As with most painted tops, the Thai Top can also be worn front to back or back to front. On one side there is a handpainted applique in the center. On the other side, there is one applique piece as a pocket and another piece asymmetrically towards the shoulder.
This way you can wear some great statement necklaces with the top.

Easy machine wash and dry. Click on "Care Instructions" on the  right toolbar for details.

To view more photos, scroll down.

options.name: S/M (up to 42" bust) - black with red
L/XL (bust up to 46") - black with red
L/XL (bust up to 46") - black with sage green
Plus -(bust up to 52") - black with chartreuse
Plus -(bust up to 52") - black with red
Plus -(bust up to 52") - black with sage green

name: Ivory Tencel Dip Top with Drape Collar, Handpainted.
description:
Fabulous top in luscious ivory colored Tencel. Hand painted in abstract ovals pattern. Very fun. Yet sophisticated looking.
On one side the center is left unpainted - so you can wear a piece of jewelry with it. On the other side it's painted across the front.
The top can be worn either front to front or back to front. 
Casually stunning with jeans. Or dressed up with a black skirt or pants.

To view more photos, scroll down.

options.name: PLUS ( bust up to 52") - off white

name: Tencel Dolman Top - Handpainted
description:
Vibrant red woven fabric and black excuberant handpainting combine to make this a top for those days when you want to be outgoing and strong. 
It's easy to enjoy yourself when you wear this.

As always: dress it up or down. And with almost all of the hand painted tops you can wear it front to back and vice versa.
 
100% Tencel - a sustainable fiber that has an amazing drape.

To see how easy it is to care for the hand painted clothes, click on "Care Instructions". 

To view more photos, scroll down.

options.name: O/S one size ( bust up to 52", hips up to 46") - red     - red
O/S one size ( bust up to 52", hips up to 46") - cinnamon

name: Cotton/Rayon Heather Dance Top - Handpainted
description:
The ultimate feel -great-look-great outfit.
Soft, drapey weave in beige, black fibers creates a heathery look of the fabric. Handpainted with energetic oval spirals.

Shown with Flair Pants in photo #3.
with the matching hand painted Flip Sirt in photo #2.

37% cotton
63% rayon

Click on "care Instructions" to see how easy it is to take care of.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Handbatiked Rayon Spirals Dance Top or Sandi Skirt
description:
Wonderfully soft and drapey natural rayon in our classic Dance Top style. Or the all flattering Sandi Skirt.  89.- per piece.
This top can be worn front or back - each side has a different design. Wear it with the matching Sandi Skirt - also to be worn front or back. The skirt has a wide band that can be folded down - which will make the skirt shorter. The skirt can also be pulled up into a strapless dress. You can create several outfits with these 2 pieces. 
The top looks awesome with the Flair Pants.

The fabric is 100% rayon that is made from wood pulp. It is a gorgeous, dense weave and hand batiked with German dyes.
The first time we've had this fabric was 14 years ago. Women still have those outfits. We have the fabric made periodically and turn it into various flattering, fun styles. 
It washes and dries beautifully.
100% rayon made from wood pulp. 
Hand batiked with German dyes.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Tencel Handpainted Swing Tunic
description:
A super comfy, over-sized  tunic that swings beautifully when you twirl. 

Hand painted on 100% Tencel, the color of a deep burgundy wine. 
The fabric has a great texture. It's a medium weight, more substantial fabric with an incredible drape.
This is one of those tops you just want to live in.
It's a one/size tunic that  fits most sizes from small to plus. It has
2 pockets.

For detailed easy care , please click on "Care Instructions" on the left.

To view more photos, scroll down.

options.name: O/S one size (bust up to 60"/hips up to 90") burgundy with black paint

name: Cotton blend Dance Dress - Handpainted
description:
I love this dress. It's one of those statement pieces you want to pull out every day and wear it in a different way:
   with leggings, with jeans,  with a long dress underneath, with a turtleneck and slacks, with over-sized artsy pants; belted, pinned ....tons of options to explore.
Great pockets.

To view more photos, scroll down.

options.name: S/M (bust up to 42") - Natural, dark stripe with black paint

name: Cotton Dance Tunic, Handpainted
description:
Slightly textured cotton in white with black weavings. Hand painted with black freehand design.
Very fresh and cool. Perfect  in the summer heat.
Especially with the lightweight matching hand painted "Cabana Pants" - shown in pictures 1,2,3.
 For a dressier look, pair it with the matching hand painted "Celebration Skirt" - shown in pictures 4 and 5.
Change the look with black bottoms. Layer it in the colder weather with a black or red turtleneck.

It's a great top for many occasions and looks.

Change the mood to more sizzle with the red and black "Passion Necklace" or make it more subdued with the black and silver "Lava Rocks" Necklace.

100% cotton.
Easy wash and dry.
Please, click on "Care Instructions" in the toolbar on the right for details.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Rayon/Spandex knit Dip Tunic - Hand painted
description:
Super soft white, cuddly rayon/spandex fabric  has an amazing drape. It's light weight and airy.
The hand painted design is like bubbles of pure delight and makes you feel joyful and happy.
Wear it dressed up or down, with a matching Flip Skirt (photo #2) or pieces from your existing wardrobe.

8.25% sales tax is added to orders placed in Texas.

To view more photos, scroll down.

Shipping Charges not included in the price.

name: Dance Top -  Hand painted Tencel. Machine washable.
description: Flattering style, hand painted with "Music in the Fountain" design. Denim blue and a little black paint on a butterscotch yellow. The fabric is soft and yet firm and has a very beautiful drape! Wear with jeans or dress it up with slacks or a skirt. For a sophisticated artsy look wear the matching Dance Skirt. Fiber content: 100% Tencel. The "greenest" fabric - sustainable, ecological, anti-microbial, anti-bacterial qualities. To view more photos, scroll down. Care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low -see care instructions for more details. To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Dance Top - Hand painted
description:
Textured 100% Tencel feels nice and cool in the spring and summer.
Hand painted with the "Universal Dance" design with denim blue and black fabric paint. It can be worn casually or dressed up. With light colors or black. It feels fresh and joyful.
In cooler weather, layer it with Tees or a turtleneck.

To see how easy it is to care for, click on "Care Instruction" on the right.

To view more photos, scroll down.

options.name: white with blue and black paint

name: Art Top - Handpainted
description:
A fabulous piece of clothing!
 Cool, white cotton, with black stripes woven into it, is the perfect backdrop for the handpainted design. Handpainted to make it fun and artsy.
Has pockets that blend into the design.

Looks stunning with the matching Flip Skirt - or wear with your favourite jeans and cowboy boots. This wearable art top can go from casually elegant to artsy to funky, fun.
When it's cooler outside, layer it with a longer tank or turtleneck.

Care Instructions:
turn inside out, put it into a lingerie bag.  Machine wash cold, delicate cycle. Take it out of the bag, machine dry LOW. And you will enjoy this top for a long time.
Do NOT  dry clean  and do NOT iron on the paint - both  can melt the paint. Of course, you can handwash if you prefer.

options.name: White and black with black paint

name: Tencel Tunic Dress - Hand painted
description:
Luscious tencel in a dusty teal color. Hand painted with energetic oval spirals - drawn out into abstracts.
Fabulous on its own - or paired with the Flair pants , or a skirt, or casually fun with jeans.

100% Tencel - sustainable fiber made from wood pulp. Feels amazing on.

Easy to care for - just click on "Care Instructions" on the right.

Even though this color is sold out, we are happy to make it in another color or another type of fabric. Please call us at 512-470 2553.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Tencel Transformer Tunic - Hand painted Tencel
description:
Shown with Flair pants.

One size fits most.

Shown in Turquoise tencel with black hand painting. This color is sold out. It is available in red with black paint or ivory with black paint.

This top can be worn in a multitude of ways. Transforming the look each time. Here are just a few:
Front can be worn to the back and vice verse. The painting is in different areas on each side: on one side in the center (photo 5), on the other side asymmetrical (photo 3) - that way you can jazz it up with jewelry.
Wear tops underneath - black or contrasting colors.
Wear a long shift dress underneath and belt just the front part, leaving  the back free to drape and swing.
For a fun and funky look: wear the shoulder part to the front and back. You'll have "peepholes" on your belly and in the back.

100% Tencel - a sustainable fiber made from wood pulp. Has anti bacterial properties, wicks moisture. It's amazingly comfortable and luscious.
For the easy care, click on "Care Instructions:.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Joy Tunic - black crinkle rayon - discharged
description:
From office to gallery to dinner.
Or with jeans for Saturday morning coffee. Or onto a plane to go anywhere.
 Change the look with the removable drape collar.
Shown with the super comfy Cabana pants. 
This rayon crinkle fabric travels well, is fun to wear and makes you feel as great as it looks on you.

Our rayons are made from wood pulp. They have a wonderful feel and drape.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Hand painted Drape Vest - Moab
description:
Like the colors of a cloudy, stormy evening in Moab, this vest is handpainted with a rich copper and black paint. On an earthy khaki colored rayon crepe de chine. Capturing that mood perfectly.

Sophisticated with black underneath. 
Or funky, fun with chinos or jeans and a black T-shirt.

60% rayon / 40% acetate,  crepe de chine texture.

For care, please, click on the "care instructions"on the right.

If  you have any questions or would like help choosing, or would like it customized, please call us at 512-470 2553.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Hand painted Drape Vest - Sedona
description:
Rich colors of the canyons around Sedona. 
Bronze, blue and black against a golden backdrop.
A fascinating, beautiful and mystical combination.

The "golden" colored crepe de chine  has a really nice 
drape.

55% rayon/45% acetate.

Easy to care for. Please click on  "care instructions" .

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Franci Top and Sandi Skirt set -  Hand painted
description:
An easy, comfy, yet stylish top. Hand painted with black color.
A  rounded dip in front and back gives you a bit of extra length.
Perfect for hiding a "little extra".

 Matching "Sandi" skirt. Comes in different length: below knee, mid calf, long.
97% cotton/3% spandex.

Easy care: put into a lingerie bag. Machine wash cold, tumble 
dry LOW only. Do not dry clean. Do not iron on the paint. For more info, check "Care Instructions".

Beautiful Lariat Style necklace. This particular necklace is sold out, but we can make something similar. Just call  512 470 2553 or contact us via the contact page.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Serendipity Necklace/Earrings set
description:
Necklace/earrings sets:

1 necklace with greyish-blueish agate drops.
1 necklace with blue / whitish "veins" agate drops.
2 necklaces with blue / whitish veins and brown tones agate drops.
1 necklace with brown tones / milky whitish tones.

Matching earrings.

To view more photos, scroll down.

Absolutly gorgeous. Serene. Calming.
Stunningly elegant. 

Beautiful agate shapes dangling from handforged galvanized steel.
Enhanced by mysterious grey and blue faceted glass and Czech faceted crystals. Silver discs.
Handforged galvanized steel clasp.

name: A Walk in the Park - Necklace  sets
description:
Sold as Necklace/earrings sets.

2 necklaces made with darker green and yellow-green agate and jasper beads in various shapes. Carved brown resin beads. Firepolished faceted Czech cryatal beads. Large wood bicones. Handforged antiqued coppery colored clasp.

2 necklaces made with natural and brown tone jasper beads in various shapes. Carved brownish resin beads, large wood bicones, faceted firepolished Czech crystal beads. Handforged antique copper clasp.

1 necklace made with turquoise magnesite beads in various shapes. Carved brownish resin beads, copper faceted, fire polished Czech crystal beads, jaspers, wooden bicones, hand forged antiqued copper clasp.

Each necklace comes with matching earrings. 

Smell the fresh air of an autumn day. Strolling through a park, kicking up leaves, feeling gentle rays  of sunshine on your face. People are laughing. You are enjoying yourself.

Various shapes of agate beads, wood discs, carved resin, faceted and rounded jaspers in dark green and yellow green tones, turquoise, yellow-greens etc.
About 17" long with 3.5" dangles.

If you have any questions please, call 512 - 470 2553 .

name: Deep Sea Necklace and Earrings
description:
Beautiful matte blue tones with almost icy colored faceted large beads on a black cotton cord. Gorgeously cut crystal / agate slab pendant.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Enthusiasm -  Statement Necklace and Earrings set
description:
3 necklaces made with red drop pendants.
2 necklaces made with black drop pendants.

Both sets have red stone rectangular beads,  red sponge coral, red  "coral" glass rondelles. Black glass irregular shaped beads , black round glass beads. Silver tone discs, beads and toggle clasp.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Brown Jasper and Antique Gold Chain Necklace
description:
Alluring necklace. Luscious shades of brown mixed with 2 different types of antiqued brass chain. Beautiful, feminine clasp that is reminiscent of antique shapes.

The brown tones are earthy, mysterious and grounding. A great go-to necklace when you want to feel empowered and a bit fascinating.

To view more images, please scroll down.

name: Dark veined Stone and gunmetal Chain Necklace
description:
Perfect or just about any outfit: Casual, funky-fun, casually elegant , professional.....and unexpected.
 Play with it and discover the possibilities.
It's a great way to add joy to your day while feeling grounded and in charge. Bette Davis would have loved it.

To view more images, please scroll down.

name: Drape Vest with Didgeri Design - Hand painted on Rayon/Acetate Crinkle
description:
Fabulous Vest! Flattering, light weight, super drape.
Also shown with the matching scarf. Adds nice drama and flair.

name: Rayon Flamenco Skirt and Sleeveless Top
description:
Barely there lightweight printed rayon in lively sunburst colors.

The skirt has a dropwaist with a 6 inch black stretch waistband. 
It can be pulled up to wear as a strapless dress. It is cut quite uneven to create fabulous movement.
The sleevesless asymmetrical top flares out slightly, giving it lots of drape.

Together it's a casually elegant, fun outfit that can be worn for a multitude of occasions.  It's beyond comfortable and makes you feel absolutely  alive and radiant. 

This particular color is sold out. Please, call for new color swatches - 512 470 2553.

To view more images, please scroll down.

name: Azur Necklace with Coconut Heishi, Carved Magnesite Turquoise
description:
Ahhhh! Blue skies, azur waters, hair fluttering in a breeze.
Sipping coffee at a  bistro on the Mediterranean Sea. Life is good!

Coconut heishi are traditionally used in many Southern warm weather countries. The carved brownish resin and the carved turquoise magnesite beads, together with the irregular shaped magnesite discs are a fabulously unexpected combination. 

To view more images, please scroll down.

name: Naga Tribal Necklace  with Tibetan Pendant and Turquoise
description:
This is a great conversation piece. 
It's equally fabulous with a T-shirt and jeans, a suit for work,  or a great evening dress - and everything in between.

The Naga tribes are well known for their whitish pendants and beads that have darker carved  symbolic  images. 

This necklace features both: the beads and an absolutely stunning pendant with an ancient carved and darkened design. The carved Naga shell sits on on a beautifully shaped ornate brass base. With traditional turquoise and red glass inlays.
Surrounded by more carved Naga beads, turquoise magnesite barrell beads, and traditional tube and tear drop beads with brass, turquoise and red glass inlays. Handcrafted goldfilled clasp with red speckled porcelain beads and brass washers on each side.
 
To view more images, please scroll down.

name: Sahara -  African Inspired Necklace
description: Mystery, exotic lands - the beat of drums. Feel it, live it, enjoy. A variety of African lost wax beads. A mold is made for every single bead. So each bead in a strand is unique. They are based on old Ashanti tribe fine gold pieces. Carved resin beads. African vulcanic ash discs. Clasp is made with African vulcanic ash discs and a coin from 1940's Nigeria. Strung on a waxed cotton cord. The matching earrings can be purchased seperately. They are very original and you won't find others walking next to you with a similar style. They are as unique as you are. This necklace is sold. We will be happy to make you a similar one. Call us at 512-470 2553. To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Marrakesh - Tribal Necklace
description: A fun, very unique necklace that goes with just about anything. Evoking the splendor and richness of the bazaars in Marrakesh. Wear it and feel transported into a world of mystery and strength. This particular necklace is sold, but we can make one very similar. Just contact us. Or call us at 512 - 470 2553. African lost wax beads that are based on old Ashanti fine gold pieces. Every bead is made individually with a new mold. No two beads are exacxtly the same. Large porcelain beads in luscious shades of dark blue, brown and blue. Strung on cotton cord. Clasp is made with African vulcanic ash discs and a coin from 1940's Nigeria. Click here for matching earrings or another necklace. To view more images, please scroll down.

name: Egyptian Queen - Statement Necklace
description:
A feast for the senses. Lots of texture and great colors. 
This statement piece is a wonderful conversation starter.

 The beads come from all over the world - Egypt, India, Madagscar, China. The faceted carnelian tubes were hand carved  by a German master carver. The scarabs and tablets were hand carved in Egypt.
Wear it to a ceremony, to an opera, to a gallery opening. Or jazz up a tank top and your favorite pair of jeans. And discuss the wonders of life while sipping coffee at your Saturday morning hang-out coffee house.

Egyptian ankh pendant in brass; Egyptian carved tablets and scarabs*; serpentine; labradorite**; carnelian; carved bone discs and rondelles; carved "new jade" beads; hollow stamped Indian gold plated rectangles and squares; Japanese seed beads. 
* Scarabs are beetles who are masters at stead fastedly going their way and surviving the dangers to their lives. 
They move forward at a steady pace. When dangers show up, they roll over into a "ball" and play dead until the danger passes. Then they uncurl and keep going on their path.
**Labradorite was first found in the 1700s in Labrador - thus the name. These days most of the Labradorite is mined in Madagscar. As is the labradorite that I used in this necklace.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Tribal Dance - Bracelet
description: Selection of earrings and a bracelet from the Tribal Dance Collection. Carved Naga shells, hand knapped carnelian, jasper, African brass heishi, Chinese coin as a clasp. Bracelet is available here. Earrings are sold separately. To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Mirabella Wearable-Art Necklace and Earrings - Handforged Wire and Beads
description:
Whether going to a formal function, going on a date, strolling down a boulevard or sipping wine at a bistro with friends - this necklace fits the bill. It's strong, confident and playful.

3 rectangular agates, heat treated to enhance the color, dangling from hand forged galvanized steel. Surrounded by silver zinc beads and faceted blue tone crystal glass beads in different shapes. 
About 17" long with 3" dangles.

To view more photos, scroll down.

name: Zen Fire - Black and Red Coral Necklace
description:
This necklace reminds me of Asian art: the black and red , the irregular shapes of the black branch coral, the mixed sizes and shapes of the beads.  It has restraint and it has fire. It's focused and grounding - and it has passion.  Perfect for those days when you want to feel strong and confident.

Black branch coral, red coral, Czech crystal beads. 

This particular necklace is sold.

Something similar can be created. 
Just call (512) 470 2553 or e-mail if you want one.

To view more photos, scroll down.
